00025 class member
00026 {
00027     # class properties
00028     public $member_id = null;
00029     public $member_name = null;
00030     public $member_type_id = null;
00031     public $member_type_name = null;
00032     public $register_date = null;
00033     public $expire_date = null;
00034     public $member_email = null;
00035     public $inst_name = null;
00036     public $is_member = false;
00037     public $member_image = '';
00038     public $member_notes = null;
00039     protected $is_expire = true;
00040     protected $is_pending = true;
00041     protected $member_type_prop = array();
00042     protected $obj_db = false;
00043 
00044     # class constructor
00045     public function __construct($obj_db, $str_member_id)
00046     {
00047         // assign simbio database object to property
00048         $this->obj_db = $obj_db;
00049         // get member data from database
00050         $_member_q = $this->obj_db->query("SELECT m.*,mt.* FROM member AS m
00051             LEFT JOIN mst_member_type AS mt ON m.member_type_id=mt.member_type_id
00052             WHERE member_id='".$this->obj_db->escape_string($str_member_id)."'");
00053 
00054         if ($_member_q->num_rows > 0) {
00055             // set the is_member property flag to TRUE
00056             $this->is_member = true;
00057             $_member_d = $_member_q->fetch_assoc();
00058             // assign database value to class properties
00059             $this->member_id = $_member_d['member_id'];
00060             $this->member_name = $_member_d['member_name'];
00061             $this->member_type_id = $_member_d['member_type_id'];
00062             $this->member_type_name = $_member_d['member_type_name'];
00063             $this->register_date = $_member_d['register_date'];
00064             $this->expire_date = $_member_d['expire_date'];
00065             $this->member_email = $_member_d['member_email'];
00066             $this->inst_name = $_member_d['inst_name'];
00067             $this->member_image = $_member_d['member_image'];
00068             $this->member_notes = $_member_d['member_notes'];
00069             $this->is_pending = (bool)$_member_d['is_pending'];
00070             $this->member_type_prop = array(
00071                     'loan_limit' => $_member_d['loan_limit'],
00072                     'loan_periode' => $_member_d['loan_periode'],
00073                     'enable_reserve' => $_member_d['enable_reserve'],
00074                     'reserve_limit' => $_member_d['reserve_limit'],
00075                     'member_periode' => $_member_d['member_periode'],
00076                     'reborrow_limit' => $_member_d['reborrow_limit'],
00077                     'fine_each_day' => $_member_d['fine_each_day'],
00078                     'grace_periode' => $_member_d['grace_periode']
00079                 );
00080 
00081             // is membership expired ?
00082             // compare it with current date
00083             $_current_date = date('Y-m-d');
00084             $_expired_date = simbio_date::compareDates($_current_date, $_member_d['expire_date']);
00085             if ($_expired_date == $_member_d['expire_date']) {
00086                 $this->is_expire = false;
00087             }
00088         }
00089     }
00090 
00091 
00092     # checking wether member is valid or not
00093     # return : boolean
00094     public function valid()
00095     {
00096         return $this->is_member;
00097     }
00098 
00099 
00100     # checking wether membership is already expired
00101     # return : boolean
00102     public function isExpired()
00103     {
00104         return $this->is_expire;
00105     }
00106 
00107 
00108     # checking wether membership is pending
00109     # return : boolean
00110     public function isPending()
00111     {
00112         return $this->is_pending;
00113     }
00114 
00115 
00116     # get all member properties
00117     # retuen : array
00118     public function getMemberTypeProp()
00119     {
00120         // return all member information as an array
00121         return $this->member_type_prop;
00122     }
00123 
00124 
00125     # get info about item being lent by member
00126     # return : array
00127     protected function getItemLoan($int_loan_rules = 0)
00128     {
00129         $_arr_on_loan = array();
00130         // count how many items is in loan for this member
00131         if ($int_loan_rules) {
00132             $_sql_str = "SELECT item_code FROM loan AS l
00133                 WHERE member_id='".$this->member_id."' AND is_lent=1 AND is_return=0 AND loan_rules_id=$int_loan_rules";
00134         } else {
00135             $_sql_str = "SELECT item_code FROM loan AS l
00136                 WHERE member_id='".$this->member_id."' AND is_lent=1 AND is_return=0";
00137         }
00138         $_count_q = $this->obj_db->query($_sql_str);
00139         while ($_count_d = $_count_q->fetch_row()) {
00140             $_arr_on_loan[] = $_count_d[0];
00141         }
00142 
00143         return $_arr_on_loan;
00144     }
00145 
00146 }
